headline: Private equity bids for Forward Air rolling in, report says
summary: Several private equity firms have submitted bids to acquire Forward Air, according to a Reuters report. The post Private equity bids for Forward Air rolling in, report says appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: Private equity bids for Forward Air rolling in, report says
raw.summary: Several private equity firms have submitted bids to acquire Forward Air, according to a Reuters report. The post Private equity bids for Forward Air rolling in, report says appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Private equity firms including Clearlake have bid for Forward Air, sources say
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -A handful of private equity firms, including Clearlake Capital, Platinum Equity and EQT, have submitted bids to buy Forward Air, three sources familiar with the matter said, as the process to sell the U.S. trucker picks up speed.  Forward Air, which specializes in moving hauls which do not take up a full truckload, signaled to investors it wants the strategic alternatives review it announced in January to be wrapped up in a few weeks, possibly around the time the company is expected to release earnings on August 11.  Sources said buyout firms Apollo Global Management and AIP have also made bids to buy Forward Air.
